feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: The toenail looked painted now Bighorn was a muddy dirty mess as per usual #runtok #bighorn100 #ultramarathon
entry.content: The toenail looked painted now Bighorn was a muddy dirty mess as per usual #runtok #bighorn100 #ultramarathon

entry.title: Finished Bighorn 100 miler in Wyoming today. It was so hard
entry.content: Finished Bighorn 100 miler in Wyoming today. It was so hard

entry.title: My 100 mile running streak almost ended. My hamstring is screwed. Decided to risk it all on one of the hardest races in the USA. Bighorn 100 miler in Wyoming did not disappoint #bighorn100 #runtok #ultrarunner
entry.content: My 100 mile running streak almost ended. My hamstring is screwed. Decided to risk it all on one of the hardest races in the USA. Bighorn 100 miler in Wyoming did not disappoint #bighorn100 #runtok #ultrarunner

entry.title: Now the bottoms look terrible. I got some trenchfoot going on. #runtok #bighorn100 #ultrarunner
entry.content: Now the bottoms look terrible. I got some trenchfoot going on. #runtok #bighorn100 #ultrarunner

entry.title: I was awake for 38 hours and my body still wouldn't let me sleep. Between having to go to the bathroom, eating, leg cramps, and just overall soreness it takes awhile to get back to normal. Even last night I tried to sleep in and my body woke me up because
entry.content: I was awake for 38 hours and my body still wouldn't let me sleep. Between having to go to the bathroom, eating, leg cramps, and just overall soreness it takes awhile to get back to normal. Even last night I tried to sleep in and my body woke me up because

entry.title: I use Socal Ice Bandanas which is a local small business on Esty. not sponsored. Just remember to reapply lube as sometimes melted ice will wash your lube away. It looks like it's going to be a hot summer, stay cool out there. Smile, or you're doing it wr
entry.content: I use Socal Ice Bandanas which is a local small business on Esty. not sponsored. Just remember to reapply lube as sometimes melted ice will wash your lube away. It looks like it's going to be a hot summer, stay cool out there. Smile, or you're doing it wr

entry.title: I'll be going back for the fifth time this year. A couple of big races beforehand, but this is always my favorite. It takes a little while to qualify and get into it, but I assure you, it is worth it, and the experience is unmatched. Smile, or you're doi

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
